document.full_text: jay bruce hit a tie-breaking, three-run double in the ninth inning and the cincinnati reds beat the host philadelphia phillies, 6-3, tuesday night to snap a six-game losing streak.
document.title: roundup: reds end losing streak with rally in ninth inning
lines_and_colors: jay bruce hit a tie-breaking, three-run double in the ninth inning and the cincinnati reds beat the host philadelphia phillies, 6-3, tuesday night to snap a six-game losing streak.
